amendment.description: Amendment requires each Federal agency to submit and obtain approval from the Director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP) on guidelines for ensuring and maximizing the quality, objectivity, utility, and integrity of scientific information relied upon by the agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to require each Federal agency to submit and obtain approval from the Director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP) guidelines for ensuring and maximizing the quality, objectivity, utility, and integrity of scientific information relied upon by the agency.
